body: Perfect example of how humans screw things up
i felt my heart sinked as i read through chapter 17 to 20... i think i can totally feel the main. Its a story that made me sad.

All dem cute looking young adult women and men, alas story is just so deep to fap too. Imagine if the author from otaku 10k bc and this webtoon ever do some collaborative works that shit will be too good for humanity.
Again, the main character is such a total ASSHOLE!!!
When you wanna fap so badly but the story clearly isn't shit, to the author; Omega Good Job!
